ValidationRule.description: Only the admin users should be able to
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISPICKVAL(FS_FC_Type__c,'File Upload Flavor Change'), AND( NOT($Profile.Name='System Administrator'), NOT($Profile.Name='FET System Admin'), NOT($Profile.Name='FS AC_P'), NOT($Profile.Name='FS PIC_P'), NOT($Profile.Name='FS Admin PM_P'), NOT($Profile.Name='FS PM_P')),OR( !ISCHANGED(FS_SP_go_out__c), !ISCHANGED(FS_Pungent_Change_Indicator__c)), !FS_isBatch__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have sufficient access to update a record created through the file upload option. Please request help of your FET help support member
